The Middle Ages is still a much sought-after and exciting theme for many online casino players. Precisely for this reason, the software provider Microgaming has decided to make the highly expected Avalon online slot. We are talking about a title that is among the best ever in its genre and theme, designed with 5 reels and 20 paylines on which to play. It’s a popular choice for both beginners, but also for those players who want to try a classic game, which has different ways of winning. It’s based on the legend of King Arthur, and takes us right to his sword, as well as also the place where he was guided to heal, right after the Battle of Camlann. Thanks to its bonus round, a state-of-the-art theme in terms of graphics and design, and the 12 free spins offered, this gaming experience may turn out to be more interesting than you think. So, let's see why! 

Avalon: Graphics and Game Symbols 

So we are on an island, right where the legendary King Arthur was buried. The reconstruction of this setting is incredible on a graphic level, but also in terms of the design that accompanies the entire gameplay. It’s easy to see the attention to detail and great care that simply makes this title, and its features excel, even in the looks. 

The player, who’s placed in this mysterious atmosphere, is confronted with symbols meant to accompany a legendary story. This is where the coats of arms, caskets, cups, crowns, spires, and the ever-present poker cards pop up as symbols.  

Very important are the 2 Wilds of Microgaming’s slot: one is the Avalon symbol and the other is the treasure chest. The first one is crucial because it serves to replace all the symbols in the game and help you form new lucky combinations. The second is vital to access the Free Spins feature.  

Nevertheless, this second symbol can replace game symbols, but he has no power over the lady of the lake. She, who is also the main protagonist of the slot, is the Scatter symbol. If she appears at least 3 times on the playing field, she can trigger free spins and help you find a 7x multiplier for the wins you get.  

At this stage of the game, if you finish the 12 free spins, you can activate additional spins when you find 3 or more Scatters. 

If you line up the Wild Symbol 5 times on a payline, you can win 30,000 coins. This makes it one of the most profitable bonus rounds among online slot machines. 

Avalon Slot: Final Thoughts 

The gameplay of the Avalon slot is well done and is one of the most fascinating you will find online. It has medium volatility and a good 96.1% RTP. With its bonuses, free spins, and extra features, it manages to provide good fun and entertainment for beginners as well as experienced players who like to gamble a bit more in terms of bet value as well. Avalon is a well-balanced game that, thanks to the so intuitive options it offers, will know how to relax, and entertain you at the same time!
